name: Watchful Gaze
summary: You use your many eyes to look in all directions at once, making you extremely observant for a short period of time.
description:
You use your many eyes to look in all directions at once, making you extremely observant for a short period of time. You gain all-around vision until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.Watchful Gaze Leads To...

Constant GazeTraitsConcentrate: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.

Goloma: Insular humanoids that bear countless eyes.
